Smart नारी

Smart नारी is a supportive community helping anyone and everyone to free themselves of gender based violence (GBV) in order to enjoy healthy and safe sexuality and relationships.

S afe

M eticulous

A spirational

R ighteous and

T houghtful.

No WOMAN IS AN ISLAND and for that matter no man either.

“Nepali women are at highest risk of physical and sexual violence within the home and marriage rather than from strangers”. How often do we say "Stop!” to someone abusing us, or intervene in another’s violent domestic dispute? Do we brush off what happens within our own families whilst supporting anti-GBV campaign posts on Facebook? How often have we thought, “ That would never happen to a woman like me...”

Otherwise, Nepal is known as one of the most remarkable places to live in, and we at Smart नारी intend to keep it that way.

Our Aims

SEX MATTERS to your overall health . We promote sexual relationships that are consensual and non-exploitative.

We want to help make your voice count. No judgments! We promise. Help us to help you. Talk to us about values, emotions, passions, desires and relationships, stigmas and taboos!

Talking about the "S" word isn’t easy, but we can help you normalise thatdialogue until it becomes easier for you and your partner. Sex is wonderful but it can sting! Learn about safer sex and still have lots offun. We will help you discriminate between life enhancing GOOD SEX behaviours as opposed to pornography, and to understand the pain-pleasure dynamic.

We will empower you to say NO for the sake of love. There is help at the tip of your finger with the Smart नारी app.

WELCOME to the world of SMART नारी, where you will become a part of creating an ideal Nepali community you always hoped to live in. We believe in your extraordinary potential! Let's cherish and celebrate this amazing life together, shall we?

Configure MyCircle \" Happy %s! from everyone at %s. \" I want this message to be Anonymous update circle

Last Update: 18 March 2018

Smart नारी trusts that the information provided by you during registration is correct. In turn we respect the privacy of our mobile application users, hereby referred to as the App.

This Privacy Policy and Terms, hereby referred to as PPT, explains how we collect, use and safeguard your personal information when you visit the App. This means we ensure that all personal information are regarded as confidential and never made public without your consent.

This App is made for people 16 years of age and over. It is nevertheless family friendly but we do encourage active parental guidance for children under 16 years.

Please read this PPT carefully. If you do not agree with the content please do not register to the App.

We reserve the right to make changes to the PPT at any time, for any reason. We will alert you about any changes by updating the “Last Update” date of this PPT. You are encouraged to periodically review this PPT to stay informed of updates. You will be deemed to have been made aware of, will be subject to, and to have accepted the changes in any revised PPT by your continued use of the App after the date such revised PPT is posted.

The App is available freely in authorised app stores. It offers free download and allows for user registration and thus collects your personal information, the latter hereby referred to as the “user data.” However, any functions that require phone calls, text messaging and mobile data will be subject to carrier charges. Users will be asked for permission beforehand for these kind of usage.

  1. 1. What specific user data do we collect?

Your full name, email address, mobile number, your birth date and address as well as device ID (IMEI number) along with the names and mobile numbers of persons you have included in your My Circle or any other groups you may create therein.

  1. 2. Why are we collecting the user data?

The primary reasons for this engagement is to a) ensure your safety and security i.e. send SMS and locate your whereabouts in case of an emergency, b) link you directly to relevant public services of your choice and NGO support, c) give you access to our life coaching and counselling experts and d) analyse your preferences for various features of the App. We collect user data for your continued engagement with the App.

  1. 3. How will we utilize the user data

We will utilize the user data for a) your safety and security as described above, b) identify your feedback on features as well as your preferences and c) conduct analysis of your use to generate statistics.

  1. 4. Who will be collecting the data and have access to it

The Technical Team of Smart नारी will be confidentially holding all the user data collected by the App and also ensuring all the safeguards are in place.

  1. 5. What rights do users of the App have regarding management of their own data

Users of the App will be able to change their personal information and update their profile any time after registration. The App will ask for your permission/consent as and when required.

Smart नारी Registration No: 166760/073/074

Date of Registration: 7 April, 2017

Smart नारी Pan No: 605967919

Users are free to download and use the App for informational, educational and research purposes. Use of the original material and content of the App for printing, publication, training or dissemination without crediting or referencing Smart नारी will be considered as infringement of the copyright and intellectual property rights owned by Smart नारी.

Smart नारी, reserves all rights related to the following:

Name: Smart Naari, Smart Nari and Smart नारी

Logo: Design and Colours

Slogan: Tap it Stop it

Design: Original name, logo, slogan, features, blogs, games and quizzes.

Content: Title of original features and all original content and writing

Photos: Original as marked

Mapping: Original as marked


Date of copyright: March 2018 onwards

See Services on Map Report Search Related to the reported \'Type\' above Offender

Smart नारी is a supportive community, helping all who want to take a stand against all forms of abuse, violence and harm , or need to free themselves from it, enjoy their gender identity and sexuality, stay healthy, have fun and be in safe relationships.

The Smart नारी “App,” allows you with one big shake of the mobile to instantly contact your “My Circle” in case of trouble and to report abuse, violence and harm , whenever and wherever you experience it. It also offers information on relevant public and NGO support services that you can access to stand your ground; protect yourself and those around you.

The Smart नारी community nurtures a positive sense of self and self-image and sets high standards for the quality of our personal relationships. We empower each other to question abusive relationships and refuse to live in fear for there is so much more to live for.

Smart नारी was created by a group of women and men determined to end the silent suffering of thousands of Nepalese, overwhelmingly these are women but not always, in what should be the safe haven of our own homes, offices and intimate relationships.

Our Philosophy

ZERO TOLERANCE OF ABUSE, VIOLENCE AND HARM

How? By preventing gender based violence (GBV) and promoting empowerment, sexual health, timely recognition of extreme anxiety, providing stress relief and anger management as part and parcel of preventing abuse and stopping the violence that causes so much harm.

No woman is an island and for that matter no man or whichever gender identity or sexual orientation you may go by. But, how often do we brush off what happens within our own families whilst supporting anti-GBV campaigns or just clicking “Like” on relevant Facebook posts? How often have we thought ‘ that would never happen to a woman like me... ? Or worse “ She asked for it. ” In our book no one deserves abuse and violence, whatever the reason.

Sex matters to your overall health . We promote sexual relationships that are consensual and non-exploitative.

We want to help make your voice count. No judgments! Promise. Talk to us about values, emotions, passions, desires and pleasures, making contraception fun, even your disgraces and anathemas, no holes barred! We will help you discriminate between life enhancing GOOD SEX behaviours and those, which hurt real bad.

WELCOME to the world of SMART नारी. We believe in your extraordinary potential! Lets cherish and celebrate this amazing life together, shall we?

Disclaimer The App is intended for informational, educational and research purposes only. The authenticity of the report of abuse, violence and harm is the full responsibility of the App user. Smart नारी only provides information on relevant public services and NGO support and does not take responsibility for access and follow up by the user of the App. Smart नारी will not participate in any criminal investigation or punishment. \n\nThe App focuses on prevention approaches to gender based violence, violence against women and promotion of positive interventions. The information in the App is not intended for use in diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of diseases. Social workers and health care providers should exercise their own independent judgment should the user of the App be in touch with them. \n\nIn content of several features, definition is based on our research and understanding of the words and phrases for the use of this App. We have kept glossary as scientific, factual and brief as possible. This is however dependent upon the sources that we consider authentic to the best of our knowledge. \n \nSmart नारी is careful but does not claim full authenticity of information in the public domain that the App may use. Service information has been taken from relevant official websites or provided by the organisation as acknowledged. Permission or agreement is not given voluntarily by a person or persons to another person or persons. It always means the act in whatever form or type is unwelcome. No Consent learn More Got It !! Do you want to learn more about The Smart नारी Team includes people from a variety of ages and backgrounds; single people, partners, husbands, wives, mothers, fathers and the all-important mother-in-law, all of whom share their experiences like our friends and enthusiasts, YOU, for a fuller understanding of the issues and pressures facing everyone today....
